base

Title:
Base - variables with that are easiest to access

Kind of global variables (depending if this is imported in other modules)

immutable string g_displayTitle;
What appears on the windows title bar

ALLEGRO_FONT* g_font;
Main font

immutable int g_numberOfLettersInTheAphabet;
Store the number of letters in the English alphabet

enum g_PrintFatness;
Font thickness list of possible settings

string g_emptyText;
Empty string

immutable string g_voicesFolder;
Alphabet letter sounds folder

immutable string g_playBackFolder;
Sounds, pictures and other media

immutable string g_devide;
reference word devider

immutable string g_endOfList;
End of list of keys

immutable string g_soundExtentions;
sound file extentions

immutable string g_imageExtentions;
image file extentions

immutable string g_mediaExtentions;
both sound and image extentions
